node.doctext:
These are the wonderful people who have offered to guide the newbies through their first steps. Timezone and specialties can be found at [E2 mentoring sign-up].

N.B.This group is for announcements by [mch|the maintainers] only.
Discussion about the finer and grosser points of mentoring is encouraged in the [helpline] group - ask one of the maintainers to be added if you like.
node.title: mentors
